data.address: Qism Kafr El-Shaikh , Kafr El-Shaikh, Egypt

data.desc:
Motivated software engineer skilled in full‑stack development. Proficient in JavaScript, React, and Node.js , Typescript ,for building scalable web applications.
Experienced in front‑end development, creating engaging user interfaces with modern frameworks. Strong problem‑solving abilities and familiar‑
ity with agile methodologies. Continuously learning and keeping up‑to‑date with emerging technologies. Committed to delivering intuitive user
experiences and collaborating efficiently with team members.
data.title: Summury

data.desc: I am a full-stack developer experienced in Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, and Tailwind CSS. With my strong skills in these technologies, I can deliver efficient and high-quality solutions. My expertise in both frontend and backend development allows me to create seamless user experiences. I am confident that my dedication, versatility, and problem-solving abilities make me an excellent candidate for your team. Hire me for reliable and exceptional development expertise.
data.title: Why choose Me

data.name: Disney
data.desc:
OverView:

Developed a Disney clone website using Next.js, a popular React framework known for its server-side rendering capabilities, ensuring fast loading times and optimal performance.

KeyFeatures:

  • Implemented server‑side rendering for fast loading times and optimal performance.
  • Designed a responsive user interface resembling the Disney website.
  • Utilized Next.js routing for seamless navigation.
  • Implemented search functionality for easy content discovery.
  • Ensured responsive design for different devices and screen sizes

data.name: Youtube Downloader
data.desc:
OverView:
Developed a Y2Mate clone website that allows users to download and convert online videos from popular platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, and others.

KeyFeatures:

  • Enabled users to download and convert online videos from platforms like YouTube and Vimeo.
  • Designed a user-friendly interface for users to paste video URLs and select desired formats.
  • Integrated APIs to fetch video metadata and handle the download and conversion processes.
  • Implemented advanced features such as thumbnail generation, progress tracking, and error handling.
  • Ensured responsive design for optimal user experience on different devices.
  • Collaborated with a team using Git for version control and efficient project management.

data.name: Cv Api Builder
data.desc:
Overview:
Resume-API Builder is a web application that simplifies the process of generating APIs for resumes. It allows users to enter their resume details and personal information, which are used to create a custom API for their resume .

KeyFeatures

  • User-Friendly Interface: The application provides an intuitive interface for users to input their resume details and personal information easily.
  • Custom API Generation: Resume-API Builder dynamically generates a custom API based on the entered information, serving as a digital representation of the user's resume.
  • Integration Support: The generated API can be easily integrated into other applications or websites, enabling users to showcase their resumes programmatically.
  • Technology Stack: The application is built using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Express, and MongoDB, ensuring a robust and efficient development process.

data.name: Radalata
data.desc:
OverView:
Radalata is an innovative web application that enables anonymous messaging worldwide. Users can send and receive weird messages from anonymous individuals, fostering a sense of intrigue and open communication.

KeyFeatures:

  • Anonymous Messaging: Send and receive weird messages without revealing your identity, ensuring privacy and encouraging uninhibited conversations.
  • Global Reach: Connect with people from around the world, facilitating diverse and multicultural exchanges of ideas and experiences.
  • Real-Time Communication: Utilizes Socket.io, Next.js, TypeScript, and Express to enable real-time messaging for an interactive user experience.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use interface for seamless navigation and quick message submission.
  • Engaging Community: Build a vibrant community of users who enjoy sharing and responding to weird messages.

data.name: IP Address Tracker
data.desc:
OverView:
The IP Address Tracker is a web application developed using Express.js and Tailwind CSS. It provides users with a convenient way to track and obtain information about IP addresses. By entering an IP address, users can retrieve details such as location, ISP, and other relevant data.

KeyFeatures:

  • IP Address Tracking: The application allows users to enter an IP address and retrieve information about its location, ISP, and other relevant details.
  • Express.js Backend: The backend of the application is built using Express.js, a fast and minimalist web application framework for Node.js. It enables efficient handling of requests and data processing.
  • Tailwind CSS Styling: The user interface is designed using Tailwind CSS, a utility-first CSS framework. It offers a responsive and visually appealing design for a seamless user experience.
  • Geolocation Data: The application leverages geolocation data APIs to fetch and display accurate information about the IP address location.
  • User-Friendly Interface: The interface is intuitive and user-friendly, making it easy for users to input an IP address and view the corresponding information.

data.name: Space tourism
data.desc:
OverView:
The Space Tourism App is a web application designed to showcase space tourism destinations. It utilizes React and Tailwind CSS to create an interactive and visually appealing user experience.

KeyFeatures:

  • Destination Showcase: The app presents various space tourism destinations, providing information and captivating visuals to engage users.
  • Responsive Design: The app is built to be responsive, ensuring a seamless experience across different devices and screen sizes.
  • Interactive Elements: Users can interact with different elements of the app, such as viewing details of specific destinations and exploring available packages.
  • Visual Appeal: Tailwind CSS is used to enhance the app's aesthetics, creating visually appealing layouts, typography, and color schemes.

data.name: Multi Step Form
data.desc:
OverView:
The Multi-Step Form is a single-page application developed using React, Tailwind CSS, and React Router. It simplifies the form-filling process by breaking it down into multiple steps, providing users with a seamless and guided experience

data.name: Company page
data.desc:
OverView:

Single Page is a website built using Bootstrap and Sass. It serves as a concise and informative online presence for a company, providing essential details and showcasing its products or services on a single page.

data.name: Interactive comments section
data.desc:
OverView:
The Interactive Comment Section is a dynamic and engaging feature that allows users to interact and share their thoughts on a platform.
